title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
We’re hiring a Senior Backend Developer to design, build, and maintain scalable backend systems. You’ll focus on clean APIs, database design, infrastructure, and backend performance. Our main stack includes Node.js, MongoDB, AWS, and some Python. Familiarity with React/React Native is a plus. Strong use of modern AI coding tools (like Copilot, Claude) is important.
Key Requirements:

6+ years backend development experience
Deep knowledge of Node.js and MongoDB
Hands-on AWS experience (ECS, EC2, S3)
Security, scalability, and clean architecture focus
Strong independent problem-solving skills

Bonus: Python skills, React/React Native familiarity, CI/CD, A/B testing experience.
Why Join:

Build backend systems that power real-world learning
Work in a small, fast-moving team
Shape tech stack and backend architecture
Flexible, meaningful work environment

company_overview:
Singit is revolutionizing English learning through the power of music and AI.

Our platform transforms chart-topping songs into personalized, interactive English lessons that feel more like fun than study.

With over 5 million songs and smart pedagogical design, we help learners of all ages build vocabulary, improve pronunciation, and master real-world English — whether at school or on their own.

Already used by over 500,000 students in schools worldwide, Singit blends cultural relevance with proven language strategies to make learning stick.

Want to bring Singit to your school, platform, or country? Let’s talk.
